name: DevToolkit Pro License
short_description: Productivity bundle including IDE plugins, CLI tools, and deployment templates.
long_description: Boost developer productivity with preconfigured plugins, CLI utilities, and boilerplate templates for React, Node, and Python. Includes priority support and one activation key per developer.

name: SecureEdge Firewall Appliance (Model SE-100)
short_description: Small-office hardware firewall with remote management.
long_description: A compact, high-performance firewall featuring IDS/IPS, VPN, and centralized management. Ideal for SMBs and branch offices. Includes 1 year firmware updates and 90-day hardware warranty.
warranty: 90 days hardware warranty + 1 year firmware updates

faq.question: Does it support VLANs?

name: EliteCloud Starter (12-month credits + setup)
short_description: Cloud onboarding package with one-month managed support.
long_description: Managed cloud setup for AWS/Azure/GCP, secure architecture design, CI/CD integration, and 1-month onboarding support. Best for startups and small teams.

name: IoT Sensor Pack (5-pack)
short_description: Environmental IoT sensors (temp, humidity, light) with SDK.
long_description: Plug-and-play sensors with secure MQTT, sample firmware, and data dashboard templates. Perfect for pilot deployments.
image_alt: IoT sensor pack on a desk

name: CyberCare Annual Support
short_description: Annual cybersecurity monitoring and incident response retainer.
long_description: 24/7 monitoring, monthly vulnerability scans, incident response playbook, and quarterly security reviews. Includes two emergency incident responses per year.

name: Custom Software Project
short_description: Tailored software development and integration services.
long_description: Our team will work with you to deliver custom software development, integration, and consultation services tailored to your specific needs.
